About me

I’m a lead UX designer with over 20 years’ experience designing and building complex systems and digital products.

I work across discovery, definition and delivery, using structured design thinking to bring clarity to complex problems. My approach combines research, systems thinking and iteration — shaping information architecture, flows and interaction patterns that hold together at scale and stand up in real use.

Having extensive experience building front ends gives me a practical understanding of how products are made and helps me collaborate confidently with engineering teams. While I’m not a developer today, that technical grounding informs how I design and how I communicate across disciplines.

Alongside hands-on design, I lead and support teams — managing designers, mentoring at different stages and helping establish thoughtful, consistent ways of working. I’m comfortable operating with senior stakeholders while keeping teams focused on meaningful, well-reasoned decisions.
